{"step_by_step_thinking": "Document [0] states that the effectiveness of ubrogepant for the acute treatment of migraine was demonstrated in two randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled trials. Document [1] also supports this by stating that ubrogepant 50 mg and 100 mg may be equally effective to alleviate migraine. Document [2] further supports this by stating that treatment with ubrogepant during mild pain resulted in significantly higher rates of freedom from pain, freedom from associated symptoms, and achieving normal function 2 hours after administration. Therefore, based on these documents, it can be concluded that Ubrogepant is effective for migraine.", "answer_choice": "A"}
